titleStmt.title: A penny post: or, a vindication of the liberty and birthright of every English-man in carrying merchants & other men's letters, against any restraint of farmers of such employments. By John Hill.
titleStmt.author: Hill, John, of York.

notesStmt.note: Caption title reads: A penny-post, or a vindication of the liberty of every Englishman, in carrying merchants and other men's letters, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
